title: GET_CALMING_QUAD_AT_COORDS
content:
0x870E8B40// GetCalmingQuadAtCoords
int GET_CALMING_QUAD_AT_COORDS(float x, float y);Parameters:x: The X coordinatey: The Y coordinateReturns: The calming quad index at the given position. Returns -1 if there isn't any there.This native returns the index of a calming quad if the given point is inside its bounds.Examples:Lualocal currentPedPosition = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local calmingQuadIndex = GetCalmingQuadAtCoords(currentPedPosition.x, currentPedPosition.y)
codeBlocks:
// GetCalmingQuadAtCoords
int GET_CALMING_QUAD_AT_COORDS(float x, float y);

local currentPedPosition = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local calmingQuadIndex = GetCalmingQuadAtCoords(currentPedPosition.x, currentPedPosition.y)
